content: dr horrible penny wristwarmers i kinda made this pattern up on the fly but it worked pretty well so i wrote it out obviously the characters do not belong to me the belong to joss whedon however the pattern is mine and was created entirely by me please credit me if you use the pattern i do not mind if you sell the finished product as long as you credit me for the pattern - materials bernat berella 4 in forest green vanna s choice lionbrand in espresso 5mm h hook 4mm g hook 1 starting with the green and the 5mm hook chain 22 2 single_crochet in second chain from hook and all the way across 21sts turn chain 1 single_crochet all the way across 21sts tie off 3 join the brown yarn and single_crochet two row of 21 sts tie off 4 join the green yarn and single_crochet two row of 21 sts tie off 5 repeat steps 3 and 4 until you have a total of 8 row 4 green and 4 brown 6 join the green yarn and single_crochet 8 chain 1 turn single_crochet 8 tie off 7 join brown yarn and single_crochet 8 chain 1 turn single_crochet 8 tie off 8 repeat step 6 9 repeat step 7 10 on opposite side of the rectangle join green yarn and single_crochet 12 chain 1 turn single_crochet 12 tie off 11 on that same side join the brown yarn single_crochet 12 chain 1 turn single_crochet 12 tie off 12 repeat step 10 on this same side 13 repeat step 11 on this same side 14 join the green yarn on the first side single_crochet 8 chain 1 single_crochet 12 chain 1 turn single_crochet 21 tie off 15 switch to the 4mm hook and join the brown yarn on the side where the seam will go single_crochet down the length of the seam it ends up being 26 sts chain 1 turn single_crochet 26 chain 1 turn single_crochet 26 chain 1 turn single_crochet 26 chain 1 turn 16 with wrong side facing out slip_stitch using the brown yarn still the seam together to form a tube tie off 17 on the hand end of the tube join the brown yarn and single_crochet 26 sts around to edge the glove chain 1 turn single_crochet 26 chain 1 turn single_crochet 26 join with slip_stitch and tie off 18 switch back to the 5mm hook and join the brown yarn to the arm end of the tube single_crochet 26 working around the circle chain 1 turn single_crochet 26 chain 1 turn single_crochet 26 join with a slip_stitch 19 tie off and weave in ends 20 you can make this bigger by either switching to bigger hooks or adding a couple more stitches
